channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Ice Cream Van, 5th September
item.description:
Ice cream van sounding chimes after 7pm , and longer than the time permitted

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 47, Manser Street, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Water leak, 5th September
item.description:
Water leaking from shut off valve on main road opposite side to champion chip shop..This has been leaking for over 2 weeks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 67, Hesters Way Lane, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown greenery obstructing footpath, 4th September
item.description:
Almost the whole footpath along Finlay way on the right hand side towards Lidl, is gradually getting more and more covered by overgrown plants, including weeds and nettles. I can’t push my pram that way anymore without nettles dangling into my baby’s pram or bumping into overgrown greenery. I have to wheel the pram on the grass to go around it which I shouldn’t have to do.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Bramble Chase, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole m5 southbound, 4th September
item.description:
Deep pothole about 18” across and very deep. It has been there weeks on the inside lane by marker M5 A 803. Between 1 mile and 1/2 mile marker - use the road regularly so know to avoid it but it is savage!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): M5, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Very large overgrown tree, 4th September
item.description:
This free hasn’t been cut back in over 4 years - it’s now overhanging and every time a large van or bin lorry goes under there’s loads of broken branches and debris covering the road , it’s blocking the light from both 19 and 20 Kingswood close

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown hedging, 4th September
item.description:
This happens every year , the shrubs grow halfway across the pavement obstructing the view of drivers leaving the Greyhound pub car park. Remove the shrub it's not needed.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Greyhound Gardens, Elmbridge, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken up tarmac ramp outside 1 Jersey Avenue, 4th September
item.description:
The tarmac has been displaced and broken up further by the installation of new ducting by Open reach contractors. The surface is now very uneven and is breaking up rapidly. Needs to be relaid as becoming a trip hazard.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Jersey Avenue, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple street lights not working, 3rd September
item.description:
Several street lights along Ashbrittle Road are not working. There are a lot of people who walk along here and now that it’s going dark earlier it is an issue particularly for safety.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ashbrittle Road, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Crossing button broken, 3rd September
item.description:
Not working
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tewkesbury Road, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Collapsed pigeon wire stopping lorries passinf, 3rd September
item.description:
The pigeon wire has collapsed and lorries are ripping it off to get under the bridge - saw it happen.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 137, Swindon Road, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Several awful potholes, 3rd September
item.description:
Multiple deep potholes in single track lane which are unavoidable
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Withington, Cotswold

item.title: Dead deer, 2nd September
item.description:
Dear deer on grass verge opposite the BS Honeybees site on Hucclecote Lane approaching Churchdown. (51.8672974, -2.1664698)
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hucclecote Lane, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken public bicycle pump, 2nd September
item.description:
The public bicycle pump on the pedestrianised high street near Next and Savers is broken, and has been for a year or two now. Please could it be repaired or replaced?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 141, High Street, Fairview, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping here again, 2nd September
item.description:
Paper and electrical waste and a soft toy, almost all of it perfectly usable.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Princess Elizabeth Way, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road surface degrading, 2nd September
item.description:
The tarmac on Oldfield Crescent is crumbling in 2 places outside number 1 and number 5. This is creating some big steps in the road surface. Please could you see about repairing it?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Oldfield Crescent, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pothole, 2nd September
item.description:
Large pothole been here for weeks , potential damage to wheel and hazardous for motorcycles
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): M5, Churchdown, Tewkesbury

item.title: Gas manhole missing, 1st September
item.description:
Gas manhole is missing leaving deep hole in pavement outside 8 Suffolk Road, Cheltenham
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Suffolk Road, Montpellier, Cheltenham

item.title: Pothole, 1st September
item.description:
Sunken area on inside lane. Southbound carriageway approx half mile north of J11. Potentially damaging and dangerous and there for at least five weeks.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): M5, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Terrible\dangerous road condition, 1st September
item.description:
The road surface is dangerous and very uneven. It is only a matter of time before an accident happens when a tyre blows out or a motorcycle hits it! I have reported it at least twice and yet nothing is done!!! Please can you address this problem as a matter or urgency. It is on the middle lane on the Southbound motorway near Junction 11a.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): M5, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tarmac needs Repair, 1st September
item.description:
Tarmac is crumbling and I do not walk well as I have Rheumatoid ARTHRITIS.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 19, Peter Pennell Close, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
